type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Fire of salvation
Choirs of Menoth, Exemplar units
Vassal Mechaniks, Exemplar solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Place High Exemplar Gravus and Exemplar Venger units after normal deployment. These models are placed at the same time as your models with Advanced Deployment (if any). These models must be placed in your normal deployment zone.
Model/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Kreoss' upkeep spells. These spells and their target must be declared before either player sets up models. Kreoss does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Fire of salvation
Deliverer Sunburst Crews, Exemplar units, Flameguard units, Visgoth Rhoven & Honor guard
Vassal Mechaniks, Exemplar Solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Knight Exemplar units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Fire of Salvation
Choir of Menoth, Exemplar units, Protectorate Cavalry units
Reclaimers, Exemplar solos, Vassal solos
Vessel of Judgment

benefits.ingameeffect: Increase the FA of non-character cavalry units and solos by 1.
You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Reduce the point cost of heavy warjacks without ranged weapons by 1.

For each Choir of Menoth unit in the army, one heavy warjack in the army gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Avatar of Menoth
Flameguard Cleansers, Holy Zealots, Deliverers units
Reclaimers, Vassal solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Reclaimer solos each begin with one soul token
Flameguard cleanser units gain Advance Move

For each heavy warjack, place one 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of High Rec1aimer's deployment zone after both players have finished deploying their armies but before the first player takes his first turn. These cloud effects leave play after the first round of the game.

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Avatar of Menoth
Exemplar Errants, Holy Zealots, Idrian Skirmichers
Exemplar Errant Senechals, Reclaimers, Vassals of Menoth, Idrian solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Holy zealots units gains Advance Deployment.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game
Models/units gains Incorporeal during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Blessing of Vengeance
Choirs of Menoth, Holy Zealots, Temple Flameguard, Deliverers units
Hierophant, Wracks, Exemplar solos, Vassal solos
Protectorate non-character warjacks, Avatar of Menoth, Blessing of Vengeance
Choirs of Menoth, Temple Flameguard, Exemplar units
Hierophant, Wracks, Exemplar solos, Vassal solos, Covenant of Menoth
Protectorate non-character warjacks
Choirs of Menoth, Flameguard units
Vassal Mechaniks, Flameguard Solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Temple Flameguard units gain Advance Move.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

For each warjack in Feora's battlegroup with the Continuous Effect: Fire weapon quality, place one wall template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Feora's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. When a model enters or ends its activation in the wall area, it suffers an unboostable POW 12 fire damage roll and the Fire continuous effect. Models within the wall template gain concealment. These wall templates leave play after the first round of the game.

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks
Choirs of Menoth, Flameguard units, Visgoth Juviah Roven & Honor Guard
Vassal Mechaniks, Flameguard Solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Flameguard units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks
Holy Zealots, Idrians units
Allegiants of the Order of the Fist, Reclaimers, Idrian solos, Vassal Solos
Protectorate non-character warjacks, Avatar of Menoth
Choirs of Menoth, Holy Zealots, Temple Flameguard
Hierophant, Paladin solos, Vassal Mechaniks

benefits.ingameeffect: Deliverer Sunburst Crews gain Advance Deployment

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Reznik's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either players sets up models. Reznik does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks, Scourge of Heresy
Choirs of Menoth, Exemplar units, Holy Zealots
Exemplar solos, Reclaimers, Vassal solos, Wracks

benefits.ingameeffect: Additionally, Reznik can remove 1 focus point from any number of Wracks in his control area during your first turn of the game.
Medium-based units in the army gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Models with Cenotaph or Gatekeeper begin the game with one soul token.
For each Daughter of the Flames unit in the army, one warjack in Thyra's battlegroup gains Advance Move.
Models in the army gain Stealth during the first round of the game.
Warjacks in Thyra's battlegroup are each allocated 1 focus at the start of you first Control Phase of the game.

You can redeploy Paladin solos after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

tiers.name: Anson Durst - Defenders of the Wall

type.models: Protectorate non-character warjacks
Choirs of Menoth, Paladin units, Temple Flameguard
Paladin solos, Temple Flameguard Solos, Vassal solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Paladin solos gain Advance Move.
Warjacks with the Shield advantage are automatically allocated 1 focus point during your first Control Phase of the game.
